title: India's power consumption grows 8.5% to 119.64 billion units in Nov
description: Power consumption in India increased by 8.5% to 119.64 billion units in November, largely due to festive events and economic activities. The peak power demand reached 204.60 GW, while the peak supply reached 187.34 GW in November 2022 and 166.10 GW in November 2021. The peak supply reached 224.1 GW in June, dropping to 209.03 GW in July.
